title: Health Care Optical
sortPriceAsc: From Lowest Price to Highest Price
addressLine1: Shop UG-12, C C Wu Building
phraseC: Want to learn more about our services? Contact Us for more information.
sortPriceDesc: From Highest Price to Lowest Price
contactMessage: If you have any questions or need further information, feel free to reach out to us. We're happy to help!
aboutUsDescription: Founded in 2017, we are committed to serving the vibrant community of Hong Kong with quality eyewear. Backed by over 40 years of experience in the optical industry, our passionate team brings a wealth of expertise to help you find the perfect eyewear. We proudly offer a curated selection of products, sourced both locally and internationally, including unique pieces from local designers and premium imports from Japan.
